body.p:
Hawesville Ky Sept 21st 1861
To the Excelency of B. Magoffin
Govenerof Ky and Commander in Chief of the forces of Kentucky

The members of the company of the State Guard: known as the Handcock rifles of wich which I am third Lieutenant having Refused to take the oath required by the Second Section of an act entitled "an an act to amend an act for the better organization of the Malitia approved 24th May 1861 and the company having thereby become disbanded I have the honer to tender to your Excellency this my Resignation of the office of third Lieutenant of Said Company

I have the honer to be your Excellencies obedient Servant
John S Lamar

Recommended to be accepted
By Order
Genl. T. L. Crittenden
by Geo. W. Monroe
Aid De Camp

accepted
B. Magoffin
Com in chief-
